author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: NPE after PDFDocumentGraphics2D.create() due to missing font setup and other missing initializations.
Bugfix: Properly handle state in PDFGraphics2D.drawString().
Added an example class demonstrating the use of PDFDocumentGraphics2D.

author: veithen
msg: Don't store the log level in a static attribute, because this implies that a runtime change of the log level is not taken into account.

author: nick
msg: Allow Ole10Native to be created from a DirectoryNode, not only a a POIFS

msg: Hide External Links in nav when it is empty
